hpnicfDot11RRM.name: hpnicfDot11RRM

revisions.description: Modified to add new nodes and new table.
Modified to add new nodes and new table.
Modified to add new table and new group.
The initial revision of this MIB module.

hpnicfDot11RRM.description: This MIB file is to provide the object definition of WLAN radio resource management (RRM).

hpnicfDot11RRM11nMadtMaxMcs.name: hpnicfDot11RRM11nMadtMaxMcs
hpnicfDot11RRM11nMadtMaxMcs.description: Specify the maximum modulation and coding scheme (MCS) index for 802.11n mandatory rates. The value 255 indicates that no maximum MCS index is specified. No maximum MCS index is specified for 802.11n mandatory rates by default. Besides 255, the specified maximum MCS index for 802.11n supported rates must be no less than the specified maximum MCS index for 802.11n mandatory rates.

hpnicfDot11RRM11nSuptMaxMcs.name: hpnicfDot11RRM11nSuptMaxMcs
hpnicfDot11RRM11nSuptMaxMcs.description: Specify the maximum Modulation and Coding Scheme (MCS) index for 802.11n supported rates. The specified maximum MCS index for 802.11n supported rates must be no less than the specified maximum MCS index for 802.11n mandatory rates.

hpnicfDot11RRM11aPwrConstrt.name: hpnicfDot11RRM11aPwrConstrt
hpnicfDot11RRM11aPwrConstrt.description: Configure the power constraint for all 802.11a radios. The configured power constraint is advertised in beacons if spectrum management is enabled. The range of power constraint is 0 to MAX-POWER-1 (where the MAX-POWER is defined by the regulatory domain).

hpnicfDot11RRM11aSpectrumManag.name: hpnicfDot11RRM11aSpectrumManag
hpnicfDot11RRM11aSpectrumManag.description: Enable/Disable spectrum management for 802.11a radios. When spectrum management is enabled, the WLAN sub-system advertises power capabilities of the AP and power constraints applicable to all devices in the BSS based on regulatory domain specification.

hpnicfDot11RRMAutoChlAvoid11h.name: hpnicfDot11RRMAutoChlAvoid11h
hpnicfDot11RRMAutoChlAvoid11h.description: Configure the auto-channel set as non-dot11h channels, this is, only the non-dot11h channels belonging to the country code are scanned during initial channel selection and one of them is selected.

hpnicfDot11RRMScanChl.name: hpnicfDot11RRMScanChl
hpnicfDot11RRMScanChl.description: Set the scan mode. auto: When this option is set, all channels of the country code being set are scanned. all: When this option is set, all the channels of the radio band are scanned.

hpnicfDot11APInterfNumThreshhd.name: hpnicfDot11APInterfNumThreshhd
hpnicfDot11APInterfNumThreshhd.description: Represents threshold of AP interference . If the value of AP interference exceeds this threshold, AP interference trap will be sent. If the value of this node is zero, AP interference trap will be sent immediately.

hpnicfDot11StaInterfNumThreshhd.name: hpnicfDot11StaInterfNumThreshhd
hpnicfDot11StaInterfNumThreshhd.description: Represents threshold of STA interference. If the value of STA interference exceeds this threshold, STA interference trap will be sent. If the value of this node is zero, STA interference trap will be sent immediately.

hpnicfDot11RRM11nMultiCastMcs.name: hpnicfDot11RRM11nMultiCastMcs
hpnicfDot11RRM11nMultiCastMcs.description: Specify the modulation and coding scheme (MCS) index for 802.11n multicast rates. The value 4294967295 indicates that no MCS index is specified. No MCS index is specified for 802.11n multicast rates by default. Besides 4294967295, the specified MCS index for 802.11n multicast rates must be no less than the specified maximum MCS index for 802.11n mandatory rates. Before configure the MCS index for 802.11n multicast rates, the maximum MCS index for 802.11n mandatory rates must be configured

hpnicfDot11RRM11acMadtMaxNss.name: hpnicfDot11RRM11acMadtMaxNss
hpnicfDot11RRM11acMadtMaxNss.description: Specify the maximum NSS index for 802.11ac mandatory rates. The value 0 indicates that no maximum NSS index is specified. No maximum NSS index is specified for 802.11ac mandatory rates by default. The specified maximum NSS index for 802.11ac supported rates must be no less than the specified maximum NSS index for 802.11ac mandatory rates.

hpnicfDot11RRM11acSuptMaxNss.name: hpnicfDot11RRM11acSuptMaxNss
hpnicfDot11RRM11acSuptMaxNss.description: Specify the maximum NSS index for 802.11ac supported rates. The specified maximum NSS index for 802.11ac supported rates must be no less than the specified maximum NSS index for 802.11ac mandatory rates.

hpnicfDot11RRM11acMultiCastNss.name: hpnicfDot11RRM11acMultiCastNss
hpnicfDot11RRM11acMultiCastNss.description: Specify the NSS index for 802.11ac multicast rates. The value 0 indicates that no NSS index is specified. No NSS index is specified for 802.11ac multicast rates by default. The specified NSS index for 802.11ac multicast rates must be no less than the specified maximum NSS index for 802.11ac mandatory rates. Before configuring the NSS index for 802.11ac multicast rates, the maximum NSS index for 802.11ac mandatory rates must be configured. Besides, it must be configured together with the node below.

hpnicfDot11RRM11acMultiCastVhtMcs.name: hpnicfDot11RRM11acMultiCastVhtMcs
hpnicfDot11RRM11acMultiCastVhtMcs.description: Specify the MCS index for 802.11ac multicast rates. The value 255 indicates that no MCS index is specified. No MCS index is specified for 802.11ac multicast rates by default. Besides, it must be configured together with the node above.

hpnicfDot11RRMRadioCfgTable.name: hpnicfDot11RRMRadioCfgTable
hpnicfDot11RRMRadioCfgTable.description: Configure WLAN RRM based radio type. When 802.11b parameter is modified, 802.11g parameter will be changed at the same time. In the same way, when 802.11g parameter is modified, 802.11b parameter will be changed at the same time.

hpnicfDot11RRMRadioCfgEntry.name: hpnicfDot11RRMRadioCfgEntry
hpnicfDot11RRMRadioCfgEntry.description: Configure WLAN RRM based radio type. When 802.11b parameter is modified, 802.11g parameter will be changed at the same time. In the same way, when 802.11g parameter is modified, 802.11b parameter will be changed at the same time.

hpnicfDot11RRMCfgChlMode.name: hpnicfDot11RRMCfgChlMode
hpnicfDot11RRMCfgChlMode.description: Configure the mode of channel selection. This node can be configured only when dynamic channel selection is enabled.

hpnicfDot11RRMChlProntoRadioElmt.name: hpnicfDot11RRMChlProntoRadioElmt
hpnicfDot11RRMChlProntoRadioElmt.description: Specify the AP and radio that will change channel at next calibration cycle. 0 is returned when getting the value of this node. This node can be configured only when the mode of channel selection control is user-triggered. When configuring, the higher 24 bits stand for the AP index, and the last 8 bits stand for the radio index. 4294967295 stand for configuring each radio on all APs.

hpnicfDot11RRMCfgPwrState.name: hpnicfDot11RRMCfgPwrState
hpnicfDot11RRMCfgPwrState.description: Enable/Disable dynamic power selection for the band.

hpnicfDot11RRMCfgPwrMode.name: hpnicfDot11RRMCfgPwrMode
hpnicfDot11RRMCfgPwrMode.description: Configure the mode of transmit power control. This node can be configured only when dynamic power selection is enabled.

hpnicfDot11RRMPwrProntoRadioElmt.name: hpnicfDot11RRMPwrProntoRadioElmt
hpnicfDot11RRMPwrProntoRadioElmt.description: Specify the AP and radio that will change power at next calibration cycle. 0 is returned when getting the value of this node. This node can be configured only when the mode of transmit power control is user-triggered. When configuring, the higher 24 bits stand for the AP index, and the last 8 bits stand for the radio index. 4294967295 stand for configuring each radio on all APs.

hpnicfDot11RRMCfgIntrfThres.name: hpnicfDot11RRMCfgIntrfThres
hpnicfDot11RRMCfgIntrfThres.description: Configure the interface threshold. By default, interference observed on an operating channel is considered during dynamic frequency selection and transmit power control. If the interference percentage on the channel reaches the set threshold, RRM will perform resource adjustment to control the situation.

hpnicfDot11RRMCfgPERThres.name: hpnicfDot11RRMCfgPERThres
hpnicfDot11RRMCfgPERThres.description: Configure the CRC error threshold. If the percentage of CRC errors reaches the threshold, RRM will perform resource adjustment to control the situation.

hpnicfDot11RRMCfgToleranceFctr.name: hpnicfDot11RRMCfgToleranceFctr
hpnicfDot11RRMCfgToleranceFctr.description: Configure the tolerance level. During dynamic frequency selection (DFS), the channel will be changed only if there is a better channel having lesser interference and packet error rate than those specified by the user.

hpnicfDot11RRMCfgAdjacencyFctr.name: hpnicfDot11RRMCfgAdjacencyFctr
hpnicfDot11RRMCfgAdjacencyFctr.description: Configure the adjacency factor for the band. If transmit power control (TPC) is configured, power will be adjusted when the nth neighbor is detected. The value n is the adjacency factor.

hpnicfDot11RRMAPCfgTable.name: hpnicfDot11RRMAPCfgTable
hpnicfDot11RRMAPCfgTable.description: This table defines the RRM parameters for AP.

hpnicfDot11RRMAPCfgEntry.name: hpnicfDot11RRMAPCfgEntry
hpnicfDot11RRMAPCfgEntry.description: Each entry contains information of RRM parameters for AP.

hpnicfDot11RRMSDRadioGroupTable.name: hpnicfDot11RRMSDRadioGroupTable
hpnicfDot11RRMSDRadioGroupTable.description: This table defines RRM self-decisive radio group.

hpnicfDot11RRMSDRadioGroupEntry.name: hpnicfDot11RRMSDRadioGroupEntry
hpnicfDot11RRMSDRadioGroupEntry.description: Each entry contains information of one RRM self-decisive radio group.

hpnicfDot11RRMSDRadioGroupId.name: hpnicfDot11RRMSDRadioGroupId
hpnicfDot11RRMSDRadioGroupId.description: Represents RRM self-decisive radio group ID.

hpnicfDot11RRMSDRadioGroupDesc.name: hpnicfDot11RRMSDRadioGroupDesc
hpnicfDot11RRMSDRadioGroupDesc.description: Represents the description of RRM self-decisive radio group.

hpnicfDot11RRMSDRdGrpChlHolddownTm.name: hpnicfDot11RRMSDRdGrpChlHolddownTm
hpnicfDot11RRMSDRdGrpChlHolddownTm.description: Represents the channel holddown time of RRM self-decisive radio group.

hpnicfDot11RRMSDRdGrpPwrHolddownTm.name: hpnicfDot11RRMSDRdGrpPwrHolddownTm
hpnicfDot11RRMSDRdGrpPwrHolddownTm.description: Represents the power holddown time of RRM self-decisive radio group.

hpnicfDot11RRMSDRdGroupRowStatus.name: hpnicfDot11RRMSDRdGroupRowStatus
hpnicfDot11RRMSDRdGroupRowStatus.description: The row status of this table entry.

hpnicfDot11RRMAPCfg2Table.name: hpnicfDot11RRMAPCfg2Table
hpnicfDot11RRMAPCfg2Table.description: This table defines the RRM parameters for AP.

hpnicfDot11RRMAPCfg2Entry.name: hpnicfDot11RRMAPCfg2Entry
hpnicfDot11RRMAPCfg2Entry.description: Each entry contains information of RRM parameters for AP.

hpnicfDot11RRMAPIntfThreshold.name: hpnicfDot11RRMAPIntfThreshold
hpnicfDot11RRMAPIntfThreshold.description: Represents threshold of AP interference . If the number of AP interference exceeds this threshold, AP interference trap will be sent.

hpnicfDot11RRMStaIntfThreshold.name: hpnicfDot11RRMStaIntfThreshold
hpnicfDot11RRMStaIntfThreshold.description: Represents threshold of STA interference. If the number of STA interference exceeds this threshold, station interference trap will be sent.

hpnicfDot11RRMCoChlIntfTrapThhd.name: hpnicfDot11RRMCoChlIntfTrapThhd
hpnicfDot11RRMCoChlIntfTrapThhd.description: Represents threshold of interference trap with current ap. If signal strength of the device exceeds this threshold, corresponding trap will be sent.

hpnicfDot11RRMAdjChlIntfTrapThhd.name: hpnicfDot11RRMAdjChlIntfTrapThhd
hpnicfDot11RRMAdjChlIntfTrapThhd.description: Represents threshold of adjacent interference trap with current ap. If signal strength of the device exceeds this threshold, corresponding trap will be sent.

hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptTable.name: hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptTable
hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptTable.description: This table shows the RRM channel information of each radio on all APs.

hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptEntry.name: hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptEntry
hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptEntry.description: Each entry contains information of RRM channel information of the radio on the AP.

hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptNbrCnt.name: hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptNbrCnt
hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptNbrCnt.description: Number of neighbors found on the channel.

hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptLoad.name: hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptLoad
hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptLoad.description: Load observed on the channel in percentage.

hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptUtlz.name: hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptUtlz
hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptUtlz.description: Utilization of the channel in percentage.

hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptIntrf.name: hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptIntrf
hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptIntrf.description: Interference observed on the channel in percentage.

hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptPER.name: hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptPER
hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptPER.description: Packet error rate observed on the channel in percentage.

hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptRetryRate.name: hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptRetryRate
hpnicfDot11RRMChlRptRetryRate.description: Percentage of retransmission happened on the channel.

hpnicfDot11RRMNbrInfoTable.name: hpnicfDot11RRMNbrInfoTable
hpnicfDot11RRMNbrInfoTable.description: This table shows the RRM neighbor information of each radio on all APs.

hpnicfDot11RRMNbrInfoEntry.name: hpnicfDot11RRMNbrInfoEntry
hpnicfDot11RRMNbrInfoEntry.description: Each entry contains information of RRM neighbor information of the radio on an AP.

hpnicfDot11RrmNbrChl.name: hpnicfDot11RrmNbrChl
hpnicfDot11RrmNbrChl.description: Channel number on which the neighbor was found.

hpnicfDot11RRMNbrIntrf.name: hpnicfDot11RRMNbrIntrf
hpnicfDot11RRMNbrIntrf.description: Interference observed on the channel in percentage by neighbor.

hpnicfDot11RrmNbrRSSI.name: hpnicfDot11RrmNbrRSSI
hpnicfDot11RrmNbrRSSI.description: Signal strength of the AP in dBm.

hpnicfDot11RrmNbrType.name: hpnicfDot11RrmNbrType
hpnicfDot11RrmNbrType.description: Type of the AP, managed or unmanaged.

hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryTable.name: hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryTable
hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryTable.description: This table shows the details of the latest three channel changes and power changes applied on all APs, including time of change, reason of the change and the channel, power, interference parameters.

hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryEntry.name: hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryEntry
hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryEntry.description: Each entry shows the details of channel and power changes.

hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryRecIndctr.name: hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryRecIndctr
hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryRecIndctr.description: History record type of the change.

hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryChl.name: hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryChl
hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryChl.description: Channel on which the radio operates before/after the change of channel or power.

hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryPwr.name: hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryPwr
hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryPwr.description: Power of the radio before/after the change of channel or power.

hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryLoad.name: hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryLoad
hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryLoad.description: Load observed on the radio in percentage before/after the change of channel or power.

hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryUtlz.name: hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryUtlz
hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryUtlz.description: Utilization of the radio in percentage before/after the change of channel or power.

hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryIntrf.name: hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryIntrf
hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryIntrf.description: Interference observed on the radio in percentage before/after the change of channel or power.

hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryNoise.name: hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryNoise
hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryNoise.description: Noise observed on the radio before/after the change of channel or power.

hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryPER.name: hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryPER
hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryPER.description: Packet error rate observed on the radio in percentage before/after the change of channel or power.

hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryRetryRate.name: hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryRetryRate
hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryRetryRate.description: Percentage of retransmission happened on the radio before/after the change of channel or power.

hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryChgReason.name: hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryChgReason
hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryChgReason.description: Reason for the change of channel or power. The various bit positions are: |0 |Others | |1 |Coverage | |2 |Radar | |3 |Retransmission | |4 |Packets discarded | |5 |Interference | 0 is returned when the history record type is after.

hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryChgDateTime.name: hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryChgDateTime
hpnicfDot11RRMHistoryChgDateTime.description: The time when the channel or power change occurred.

hpnicfDot11RRMRadioNbrInfoTable.name: hpnicfDot11RRMRadioNbrInfoTable
hpnicfDot11RRMRadioNbrInfoTable.description: This table shows the RRM neighbor information of each radio on all APs.

hpnicfDot11RRMRadioNbrInfoEntry.name: hpnicfDot11RRMRadioNbrInfoEntry
hpnicfDot11RRMRadioNbrInfoEntry.description: Each entry contains information of RRM neighbor information of the radio on an AP.

hpnicfDot11RRMRadioNbrSSID.name: hpnicfDot11RRMRadioNbrSSID
hpnicfDot11RRMRadioNbrSSID.description: All neighbour SSIDs scanned by the selected radio.

hpnicfDot11RRMIntrfLimit.name: hpnicfDot11RRMIntrfLimit
hpnicfDot11RRMIntrfLimit.description: This notification will be sent when interference on the radio exceeds the limit.

hpnicfDot11RRMPERLimit.name: hpnicfDot11RRMPERLimit
hpnicfDot11RRMPERLimit.description: This notification will be sent when packet error rate on the radio exceeds the limit.

hpnicfDot11RRMNoiseLimit.name: hpnicfDot11RRMNoiseLimit
hpnicfDot11RRMNoiseLimit.description: This notification will be sent when noise on the radio exceeds the limit.

hpnicfDot11RRMPowerChange.name: hpnicfDot11RRMPowerChange
hpnicfDot11RRMPowerChange.description: This notification will be sent when power changed on the radio automatically.

hpnicfDot11NewPower.name: hpnicfDot11NewPower
hpnicfDot11NewPower.description: Power of the radio after the change of power.

hpnicfDot11OldPower.name: hpnicfDot11OldPower
hpnicfDot11OldPower.description: Power of the radio before the change of power.

hpnicfDot11MonitorDetectedDevTable.name: hpnicfDot11MonitorDetectedDevTable
hpnicfDot11MonitorDetectedDevTable.description: This table shows the devices of AP detected

hpnicfDot11MonitorDetectedDevEntry.name: hpnicfDot11MonitorDetectedDevEntry
hpnicfDot11MonitorDetectedDevEntry.description: Each entry contains information of detected devices.

hpnicfDot11MonitorDevMAC.name: hpnicfDot11MonitorDevMAC
hpnicfDot11MonitorDevMAC.description: Represents MAC address of the device detected.

hpnicfDot11MonitorDevType.name: hpnicfDot11MonitorDevType
hpnicfDot11MonitorDevType.description: Represents type of the device detected.

hpnicfDot11MonitorDevVendor.name: hpnicfDot11MonitorDevVendor
hpnicfDot11MonitorDevVendor.description: Represents vendor of the detected device.

hpnicfDot11MonitorDevSSID.name: hpnicfDot11MonitorDevSSID
hpnicfDot11MonitorDevSSID.description: Represents the service set identifier for the ESS of the device which type is ap or adhoc.

hpnicfDot11MonitorDevBSSID.name: hpnicfDot11MonitorDevBSSID
hpnicfDot11MonitorDevBSSID.description: Represents the basic service set identifier of the detected device.

hpnicfDot11MonitorDevChannel.name: hpnicfDot11MonitorDevChannel
hpnicfDot11MonitorDevChannel.description: Represents the channel in which the device was last detected. AP will choose the channel which has maximum signal strength as effective channel, as there is interference between adjacent channels.

hpnicfDot11MonitorRadioId.name: hpnicfDot11MonitorRadioId
hpnicfDot11MonitorRadioId.description: Represents the radio ID of the AP that detected the device.

hpnicfDot11MonitorDevMaxRSSI.name: hpnicfDot11MonitorDevMaxRSSI
hpnicfDot11MonitorDevMaxRSSI.description: Represents the maximum detected RSSI of the device in a scan report cycle.

hpnicfDot11MonitorDevBeaconIntvl.name: hpnicfDot11MonitorDevBeaconIntvl
hpnicfDot11MonitorDevBeaconIntvl.description: Represents the beacon interval for the detected device(not include the device which type is client).

hpnicfDot11MonitorDevFstDctTime.name: hpnicfDot11MonitorDevFstDctTime
hpnicfDot11MonitorDevFstDctTime.description: Represents the time at which the device was first detected.

hpnicfDot11MonitorDevLstDctTime.name: hpnicfDot11MonitorDevLstDctTime
hpnicfDot11MonitorDevLstDctTime.description: Represents the time at which the device was detected last time.

hpnicfDot11MonitorDevClear.name: hpnicfDot11MonitorDevClear
hpnicfDot11MonitorDevClear.description: This object is used to clear the information of the device detected in the WLAN. It will return false for get operation.

hpnicfDot11MonitorDevSNR.name: hpnicfDot11MonitorDevSNR
hpnicfDot11MonitorDevSNR.description: Represents the SNR of the device in a scan report cycle.
